start.intro: Ensure that your amplifier is on and has access to the internet.
start.title: Finding device...
start.ipAddressDescription:
Ensure that the IP address of your amplifier does not change by assigning it a static IP address.

You can change this in the settings of your amplifier, under "Setup" > "Network Setup" > "IP Address", or in your router by assigning the MAC-address of your amplifier to an IP address.
start.zoneDescription: You only need to change the zone of the device if you have consciously changed it via the Yamaha App

search_device.intro: No devices were found, manually search for your device or try again.
search_device.title: Search device...
search_device.ipAddressDescription:
Ensure that the IP address of your amplifier does not change by assigning it a static IP address.

You can change this in the settings of your amplifier, under "Setup" > "Network Setup" > "IP Address", or in your router by assigning the MAC-address of your amplifier to an IP address.
search_device.ipAddressDescriptionRouter:
Ensure that the IP address of your device does not change by assigning it a static IP address.

You can do with your router by assigning the MAC-address of your device to an IP address.
search_device.zoneDescription: You only need to change the zone of the device if you have manually changed it via the Yamaha App

error.hostUnreachable: Could not reach the amplifier on this IP address. Is the IP correct and the amplifier turned on?
error.connectionTimedOut: The connection to the amplifier timed out. Is the IP correct and the amplifier turned on?
error.invalidZone: The zone "__zone__" is not supported by this device
error.invalidInput: The input "__input__" is not supported by this device
error.invalidSurroundProgram: The surround program "__program__" is not supported by this device
error.uncontrollable: Unable to control the device, maybe it's turned off?
error.badRequest: Device could not process the request. Is the zone correct?
